title: Inception
description: A skilled thief is given a chance at redemption if he can successfully perform inception.

title: Interstellar
description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to save humanity.

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind who wants to plunge Gotham into chaos.

title: Fight Club
description: An insomniac office worker forms an underground fight club.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and redemption.

title: Forrest Gump
description: The life journey of a kind-hearted man with a low IQ.

title: The Matrix
description: A hacker discovers the reality he lives in is a simulated reality.

title: Joker
description: A failed comedian descends into madness and chaos.

title: Gladiator
description: A former Roman General seeks revenge against a corrupt emperor.

title: Titanic
description: A love story unfolds aboard the ill-fated RMS Titanic.

title: Se7en
description: Two detectives hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as motives.

title: The Revenant
description: A frontiersman fights for survival after being mauled by a bear.

title: Mad Max: Fury Road
description: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, Max teams up with Furiosa.

title: La La Land
description: A jazz musician and an aspiring actress fall in love in Los Angeles.

title: The Wolf of Wall Street
description: The rise and fall of a stockbroker living the high life.

title: Black Swan
description: A ballerina loses herself while competing for a top role.

title: The Godfather
description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control to his son.

title: Pulp Fiction
description: The lives of two mob hitmen intertwine in four tales of violence.

title: The Truman Show
description: A man discovers his life is actually a television show.

title: Django Unchained
description: A freed slave sets out to rescue his wife with the help of a bounty hunter.
